title: Child-and-Parents Relationship Source References Get
description: How to get a list of source reference resources for a child-and-parents relationship.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<fs:familysearch xmlns="http://gedcomx.org/v1/" xmlns:fs="http://familysearch.org/v1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <fs:childAndParentsRelationship id="RRRR-RRR">
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/RRRR-RRR" rel="child-and-parents-relationship" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship"/>
        <source description="/platform/sources/sources/MMMM-MMM">
            <fs:tag resource="http://gedcomx.org/Name"/>
            <fs:tag resource="http://gedcomx.org/Gender"/>
            <fs:tag resource="http://gedcomx.org/Birth"/>
            <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/RRRR-RRR/source-references/698311908" rel="child-and-parents-source-reference" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship Source Reference"/>
            <attribution>
                <contributor resource="/platform/tree/contributor/UUUU-UUU" resourceId="UUUU-UUU"/>
                <modified>1970-01-02T10:17:36.789Z</modified>
                <changeMessage>Family is at the same address found in other sources associated with this family.  Names are a good match.  Estimated births are reasonable.</changeMessage>
            </attribution>
        </source>
        <source description="/platform/sources/sources/BBBB-BBB">
            <fs:tag resource="http://gedcomx.org/Name"/>
            <fs:tag resource="http://gedcomx.org/Birth"/>
            <fs:tag resource="http://gedcomx.org/Occupation"/>
            <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/RRRR-RRR/source-references/530106901" rel="child-and-parents-source-reference" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship Source Reference"/>
            <attribution>
                <contributor resource="/platform/tree/contributor/UUUU-UUU" resourceId="UUUU-UUU"/>
                <modified>1970-01-12T10:20:54.321Z</modified>
                <changeMessage>Dates and location match with other sources.</changeMessage>
            </attribution>
        </source>
    </fs:childAndParentsRelationship>
</fs:familysearch>
